C Aeolian< is the sixth mode of the Eb major scale\
C Aeolian Scale Notes: C D Eb F G Ab Bb\
Aeolian Scale Formula: 1 2 b3 4 5 b6 b7\
Aeolian Scale Intervals: W H W W H W W
